header.title: Madonna turns 60: How the star is fighting ageism in the entertainment industry
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: The pop music icon turns 60 today, and in honor of her birthday, 'GMA' reflects on her decades-long career and how she continues to push conventions aside when it comes to aging.
